verses.text:
I ought to live this, no long-er, Teach-ing by ex-am-ple, Tell each thir-sty heart That Christ is fair and sweet;
Till the sweet-est pleas-ure Of His love to tell, Shin-ing on His glad-ness, Where the sad ones dwell.

chorus.text: Beau-ti-ful Sun-beam! God sent you here, I'll be a sun-beam, *Love-ly heart to cheer.
